=WINDOWS Installation Instructions=
==Requires java/jre 5 or better==

Download and install the latest version of java from suns website (if you already have it installed you need 1.5 or later) 

Download [http://carsonday.googlepages.com/DecafWin.rar Decaf.rar] and copy it to a new directory.

Download speech pack if you want Speech enabled[http://carsonday.googlepages.com/DecafSpeech.tar.gz DecafSpeech.tar.gz] and copy it to to the new directory created above.

Uncompress the files above into a directory. (Uncompress Decaf.rar first followed by DecafSpeech.tar.gz)

To run with speech double click on DecafSpeech.jar

To run without speech double click on Decaf.jar
